name: Bottle Shooting Games - Knock Down Bottles (lisaweby)
name_original: Bottle Shooting Games - Knock Down Bottles (lisaweby)
description:
Get ready! Aim! Shoot! Looking for a perfect shooting game to pass your time? Then Bottle Shooting Games - Knock Down Bottles is the ultimate bottle shooting game you are looking for. 

You will be granted with the title of bottle hunter in this crazy bottle shooter simulator and have endless fun testing the catapult skills. Aim to take a headshot in a bottle breaking game. Have fun breaking and smashing those bottles!

To help you with aiming there is an aim trajectory line which will pop out when you pull a slingshot belt. Bottle Shooting Games - Knock Down Bottles is one of the best shooting games and slingshot games with many strategic, unique and interesting levels. You need good logical and aiming skills to complete each and every one of them. As you move to higher levels, you will find more difficulties in completing the shooting levels and knock down all the bottles.

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bottleshooting.slingshotgame
